subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Blackhawks goaltender Corey Crawford has struggled to shake the sense he’s the beneficiary of a loaded roster, but he’s excelled in this year’s playoffs and teammates refer to him as their backbone.
snippet: Blackhawks goaltender Corey Crawford has struggled to shake the sense he’s the beneficiary of a loaded roster, but he’s excelled in this year’s playoffs and teammates refer to him as their backbone.
